function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shared living spaces increase the risk of contagious disease transmission, especially during an epidemic.","Impact":"Potential for widespread infection and illness among residents.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict cleaning and hygiene protocols, promoting ventilation, and minimizing shared touchpoints.","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, touchless technology, air purifiers, and monitoring systems.","People":"Residents, visitors, and building staff.","Owner":"Building management and property owners."},{"Description":"Reliance on automation and smart home technology may lead to increased sedentary behavior and decreased physical activity, impacting overall health and immunity.","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to illness and reduced overall well-being.","Mitigation":"Promoting physical activity through smart home features, setting reminders for movement, and incorporating health-oriented automation.","Technologies":"Activity trackers, smart fitness equipment, and health monitoring devices.","People":"Residents of smart homes and individuals affected by reduced physical activity.","Owner":"Smart home technology providers and healthcare professionals."},{"Description":"Use of aeroponic systems for food production within the living environment may introduce new health risks and potential contamination.","Impact":"Risk of foodborne illness, allergen exposure, and inadequate food safety measures.","Mitigation":"Implementing rigorous food safety protocols, regular testing for contaminants, and proper maintenance of aeroponic systems.","Technologies":"Food safety monitoring devices, automated testing systems, and allergen detection technology.","People":"Residents consuming aeroponically grown food, visitors, and building staff.","Owner":"Building management, property owners, and food safety experts."}]}
